name: Memory Palace Structure
description: Non-linear narrative structure exploring memory, time, and subjective experience
distribution_philosophy: Based on memory-driven structure emphasizing past/present connections and emotional revelations

present_trigger.name: Present Trigger
present_trigger.description: A current event triggers memories and begins the journey into the past

memory_exploration.name: Memory Exploration
memory_exploration.description: Extended exploration of memories, moving non-linearly through time

hidden_connections.name: Hidden Connections
hidden_connections.description: Patterns and connections between past and present emerge

revelation.name: Revelation
revelation.description: A crucial truth about the past is revealed

integration.name: Integration
integration.description: Past and present are integrated, leading to resolution or acceptance
